Package org.webmacro.as

Class org.webmacro.as.ActionException implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

detail

java.lang.Exception detail

Class org.webmacro.as.ActionServlet implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

forms

java.util.Hashtable forms
Table of HTML forms: key = form name, value = hashtable of actions.

applicationComponents

java.util.Hashtable applicationComponents
Table of components with "application" persistence: key = component class, value = component object.

sessionComponents

java.util.Hashtable sessionComponents
Table of components with "session" persistence: key = http session, value = hashtable of component objects (key = "component class", value = component object).

componentClasses

java.util.Hashtable componentClasses
Table of all components classes: key = component class name, value = instance of org.webmacro.as.ComponentData

templateOutputVariables

java.util.Hashtable templateOutputVariables
Table of output-variables of templates. key = template.toString(), value = vector of output-variables

threadSessions

java.util.Hashtable threadSessions
Table of threads using sessions (uses getComponent(). key = thread hashcode, value = http session

_this

java.lang.Object[] _this
Used for initialization of components.

newSessionTemplate

org.webmacro.Template newSessionTemplate
Page shown upon a new session.

_problem

java.lang.String _problem
Indicates incorrect initialization - null means OK.

log

org.webmacro.Log log
ActionServlet log.

lastActions

java.util.Hashtable lastActions
Saved parameters of the last actions for each session: key = http session, value = lastActionData. Used by handle() and Action.invoke(...) methods.

sessionReaperTimeout

int sessionReaperTimeout
Sleeping period of session data reaper in miliseconds (default: 1 minute)

sessionReaper

org.webmacro.as.ActionServlet.SessionReaper sessionReaper
Thread that periodically removes unused session data.

loader

java.lang.ClassLoader loader
Used in the initialization process.

typeHandlers

java.util.Hashtable typeHandlers
Loaded TypeHandlers.
